summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of $30.60 out of the Westlake Avenue North et al, condemnation fund, Ordinance No. 17629, in favor of Helen Caughlin, who purchased lots 17, 18, 19 and 20, block 3, Terrace Hill Addition (unrecorded plat) which were sold in error by the Treasurer on May 22, 1911, and directing the Treasurer to reinstate the original assessment; for the reason that an appeal is now pending in the Supreme Court by Alfred Carlson, the owner thereof.
